dt: {bc}any of a family (Equidae) of perissodactyl mammals consisting of the horses, asses, zebras, and extinct related animals

et: New Latin {it}Equidae{/it}, family name, from {it}Equus{/it}, genus name, from Latin, horse
shortdef: any of a family (Equidae) of perissodactyl mammals consisting of the horses, asses, zebras, and extinct related animals
